Published November 13 2014

UX and UI

UX and UI — Chris Bank provides a thorough overview of the two acronyms (user-experience and user-interface, if you were wondering) and how “differentiating the two will improve them both.” I see a lot of designers assign themselves into either camp UX or camp UI, but I’ve always just stuck with the “designer” title, when asked.

Enjoy your day.
